sentence.Network_en: He is now quadriplegic and confined to a wheelchair.

sentence.Network_cn: 乔治是四肢瘫痪. 他不能移动他的胳膊或腿.

entry.tran: 四肢麻痹者;四肢瘫痪者
entry.def: A quadriplegic is a person who is permanently unable to use their arms and legs.

means.word_mean: 1. a person who is paralyzed in both arms and both legs
